org.apache.hadoop.hive.common.metrics.common

Interface Metrics

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CodahaleMetrics, LegacyMetrics

    public interface Metrics
    Generic Metics interface.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • close

        void close()
    throws Exception
        Deinitializes the Metrics system.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • startStoredScope

        void startStoredScope(String name)
        Parameters:
        name - starts a scope of a given name. Scopes is stored as thread-local variable.

      • endStoredScope

        void endStoredScope(String name)
        Closes the stored scope of a given name. Note that this must be called on the same thread as where the scope was started.
        Parameters:
        name -

      • addGauge

        void addGauge(String name,
              MetricsVariable<?> variable)
        Adds a metrics-gauge to track variable. For example, number of open database connections.
        Parameters:
        name - name of gauge
        variable - variable to track.

      • removeGauge

        void removeGauge(String name)
        Removed the gauge added by addGauge.
        Parameters:
        name - name of gauge

      • addRatio

        void addRatio(String name,
              MetricsVariable<Integer> numerator,
              MetricsVariable<Integer> denominator)
        Add a ratio metric to track the correlation between two variables
        Parameters:
        name - name of the ratio gauge
        numerator - numerator of the ratio
        denominator - denominator of the ratio

      • markMeter

        void markMeter(String name)
        Mark an event occurance for a meter. Meters measure the rate of an event and track 1/5/15 minute moving averages
        Parameters:
        name - name of the meter
